title: Riot forcing you to agree to their terms. Dictatorship in the making

replies.body: Get a better computer and play a better game.
Watch out guys, we have a badass over here
I didn't leave the game but I received this. Is this normal that everyone get this?
Maybe you shouldn't be an ass and ragequit games because you're bronze.

I dont play games that start off with 2 afks. 

And i'm challenger buddy.

http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/OCE/Warglaivez
